content.description: Stem the offwidth for first couple of bolts until you have the large pocket left of 2nd bolt. Transfer right from the pocket onto the face and climb the pockets to the top. Crux is long move to 2 finger right of last bolt. Clipping the last bolt from the 2 finger pocket is awkward, but you can do one more move to the jug rail and clip from there. One or two more moves to the lip to clip the anchors.
content.location: On the very new Lunarscape Buttress about 100 yards west of Tribal War. From Tribal War sector hop into the boulder scree and find the small, white wall in the scree. This route is the left most of what will be 4 or 5 total on this clean, short face.

content.description: Stick clip the high first bolt and strap in for a romp right off the talus. Crimp your way to the golf ball and make the big move. Once you get the second clipped it eases way up for the rest of the climb.
content.location: Currently the rightmost of the 3 routes on the Lunarscape Buttress locates maybe 75 yards west of Tribal War in the talus. Easiest to approach from the quarry on the north of the ok corral.

content.description: Clip the first standing from boulder or sticklip the first two. Lean out from the boulder to grasp the pockets and do a couple thrutchy moves before launching into thin pockets. After the initial crux off the ground you can shake in the scoop before finishing on more pockets and a hero jug below the anchors.
content.location: Currently the middle of the three routes on Lunarscape Buttress.

pathTokens: 1. Left Side (Lunarscape, Tribal War, Poker-Face, Lone Pilgrim)
